title: Possible builds for JG Graves
body:
So i was playing a game as jg Graves and i was thinking, what are some other builds then the standard Skirmisher sabre, PD, Deaths Dance, Steraks. 

After i finished the game i went searching for this new build that will carry my fat butt out of my elo, some guides said take Ghost blade over PD sometimes even take Duskblade so after all of this i really wanted to know if this build a possible viable build for graves. 

Sabre (warrior), Ghostblade, Duskblade, Deaths dance, steraks and finish with some situational item. 

Please tell me if this build is garbage, but i'll really like to have some opinions on this build.

replies.body:
I personally like to go either 70 or 100% crit with deaths dance as he one shots people with it
The main problem with this build is that its a late game build and slows you down a lot
Sabre,ghost blade and duskblade i would say are essential
